ranks: Artist (Journalist)/1, Entertainer (Freelancer)/1, Cavalry (Trooper)/0, Scientist (Explorer) Scout/1, Artist (Performer)/2
overview.name: Rille Iquiek

education: language-0, profession (Polymers)-0, profession-0, edu +1.  You are approached by an underground (and highly illegal) psionic group who sense potential in you. After psionic testing you've found that you have  an average amount  of Psionic potential.
terms: Artist (Journalist)/1: carouse-0, deception-0, persuade-0, steward-1, new ally: corporate agent, electronics (comms)-1, jack-of-all-trades-1.  You gain a patron in the arts. You were promoted.
Entertainer (Freelancer)/1: Mustering Out Benefit: Soc+1, Int+1.

Marines (Cavalry) Trooper: Gun combat (energy)-1, Gun combat (slug)-1, medic-1, gun combat (slug)-2, new contacts: army quartermaster, inveterate gambler, imperial agent. You are involved in a disastrous campaign and barely escape off planet in a frantic and badly organised evacuation. This leaves you a long way from friendly lines and you makes D3 Contacts as you return home. You are exonerated. Obtain an additional benefit in your current career. Mustering Out Benefit: The Nenjchinzhe’driante (the Consular Legion of Merit).
Explorer Scout/1: end +1, recon +1, vacc suit-1, science +1.  You survey an alien world. Science-1. You were promoted. Aging: Str-1, End-1. Mustering Out Benefit: Slug+1

Artist Rank/2: art (act)-1, new enemy: free trader, admin-1, art (act)-2. You have the opportunity to criticize or even bring down a questionable political leader on your homeworld. If you refuse and support the leader, you gain nothing. If you accept, gain an Enemy and roll Art or Persuade 8+. You choose to profit from the secret you learned. Did you learn a new skill (either Deception 1, or Streetwise 1), or did you work through the underground and gain a contact? Using your personal charm/fame, your create works or perform in an attempt to draw badly needed attention to your candidate. SOC +1.
interactions: Weaknesses: Good eye for a easy target – thievery.
